original_text: Her masters now knew that the girl could not get money for them any more. So they took hold of Paul and Silas and they pulled them to the market place of the city. They took them to stand in front of the leaders of the city.
korean_text: 여종의 주인들은 자기 수익의 소망이 끊어진 것을 보고 바울과 실라를 붙잡아 장터로 관리들에게 끌어 갔다가

sentences.original_text: that the girl could not get money for them any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그 소녀가 더 이상 그들을 위해 돈을 벌 수 없다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So they took hold of Paul and Silas
and they pulled them to the market place of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 도시의 시장으로 끌고 갔다

sentences.original_text: They took them to stand in front of the leaders of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 도시의 지도자들 앞에 세우기 위해 데려갔다
